author: scheu
msg: JAX-WS exposes properties to access the inbound and outbound attachments.  The attachments are exposed as a Map<String, DataHandler>.  Axis2 (and the Axis2 JAX-WS implementation) stores attachments on an Axiom AttachmentMap object.
This commit adds a new class, AttachmentAdapter, that is a bridge between the JAX-WS exposed property and the underlying AttachmentMap.
This commit adds a new class, TransportPropertiesAdapter, which serves a similar function (bridges the JAXWS spec property with the underlying implementation data structure).
This commit updates the JAX-WS handler testcase to test the new adapter classes.  This commit also includes some additional minor changes and logging to the JAX-WS attachments code.
